content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ms. Rahman. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I need to know a few things first. May I ask what your budget is for renting an apartment in Munich? Additionally, can you tell me how long you plan on staying in the city? This information will help me determine the best rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 700 Euros per month. I plan on staying in Munich for a year.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for providing that information. Based on your budget and the length of your stay, I would suggest a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price takes into account the cost of living in Munich and the fact that you will be staying here for a year. It is also within your budget. Is that price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your help.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Ms. Rahman. I'm glad that I could help you find an apartment that fits your needs and budget. Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
